title: Spicy Shakshuka
description: A North African and Middle Eastern classic of eggs poached in a rich, spiced tomato and pepper sauce.

image.alt: Shakshuka served in a skillet with parsley on top

instructions.follow: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and bell pepper and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic, paprika, and cumin. Cook for 1–2 minutes until fragrant.
Pour in crushed tomatoes, season with salt and pepper, and simmer uncovered for 8–10 minutes until slightly thickened.
Use a spoon to make small spaces in the sauce. Crack one egg into each spot.
Cover with a lid and cook until whites set but yolks remain soft, around 5–7 minutes.
Remove from heat, garnish with parsley, and serve warm with bread.

title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
description: A comforting, silky soup featuring sautéed mushrooms and aromatic herb.

image.alt: Creamy mushroom soup in a bowl with herbs on top

instructions.follow: Melt butter in a pot over medium heat. Add onions and cook until soft and translucent.
Add mushrooms and cook until they soften and release moisture.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend until smooth using a blender or immersion blender.
Stir in cream, season with salt and pepper, and gently heat without boiling.
Serve warm.

title: Avocado Toast with Chili Flakes
description: A quick, nutritious toast topped with creamy mashed avocado and a kick of spicy chili.

image.alt: Toast topped with avocado and chili flakes

instructions.follow: Toast bread until golden brown.
Scoop avocado into a bowl and mash with a fork.
Add salt, pepper, and lemon juice if using.
Spread avocado evenly on toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes and serve immediately.

title: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
description: A light Italian appetizer of toasted bread topped with seasoned tomato and basil.

image.alt: Bruschetta topped with diced tomatoes and basil

instructions.follow: Brush bread with olive oil and toast until lightly crisp.
Mix tomatoes, basil, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Spoon tomato mixture onto bread just before serving to avoid sogginess.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A crisp romaine salad topped with grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

image.alt: Chicken Caesar salad with parmesan shavings

instructions.follow: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until fully cooked, then let rest before slicing.
Chop romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing until lightly coated.
Top salad with sliced chicken, croutons, and shaved parmesan.

title: Beef Stir Fry
description: Tender beef strips stir-fried with vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.

image.alt: Beef stir fry with colorful vegetables

instructions.follow: Heat oil in a pan over high heat. Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir fry until tender but crisp.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, stirring to coat.
Season with salt and pepper, remove from heat, and serve warm.
